name: part_006
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2024】ｰ COLORFUL ｰ【3DLIVE】 [C-QdqYjdArM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Tachibana Hinano perform the song 'Ai no Princess-sama'.
MC section where Towa and Hinano talk about their collaboration and upcoming events.

subtitles.original: お願いキスで目を覚ましてほしいの
subtitles.english: Please, wake me up with a kiss

subtitles.original: 胸の中の声 届きますか
subtitles.english: Can you hear the voice inside my heart?

subtitles.original: 階段を登ったら ドアを開けるだけで
subtitles.english: If I climb the stairs, just by opening the door...

subtitles.original: 見つかるよ
subtitles.english: ...I'll find it

subtitles.original: お願いキスで目を覚ましてほしいの
subtitles.english: Please, wake me up with a kiss

subtitles.original: 白い棺から連れ出すように
subtitles.english: As if taking me away from a white coffin

subtitles.original: 突き刺さる憎しみは ドラマティックな事情
subtitles.english: The piercing hatred is a dramatic circumstance

subtitles.original: 祈っても 君はまだ来ない
subtitles.english: Even if I pray, you still don't come

subtitles.original: 消えてしまう
subtitles.english: I'll disappear

subtitles.original: その前に
subtitles.english: Before that happens

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: ウー！
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: えーということで、ぶいすぽから
subtitles.english: So, from VSPO!,

subtitles.original: 橘ひなのが来てくれましたー！
subtitles.english: Hinano Tachibana has joined us!

subtitles.original: こんにちは、こんばんはか
subtitles.english: Hello, or is it good evening?

subtitles.original: こんばんはー
subtitles.english: Good evening!

subtitles.original: ぶいすぽっ！の橘ひなですー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: I'm Hinano Tachibana from VSPO!! Yay!

subtitles.original: どうだった？
subtitles.english: How was it?

subtitles.original: マジで疲れた！
subtitles.english: I'm seriously tired!

subtitles.original: いやでも、ホントに一緒に踊れてよかった
subtitles.english: But I'm really glad we could dance together.

subtitles.original: 初めてだもんね、3Dでコラボするの
subtitles.english: It's our first time collaborating in 3D, right?

subtitles.original: そうなんですよ
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: 結構前に、3Dになったらコラボしようねって
subtitles.english: A long time ago, we said let's collab when we're 3D.

subtitles.original: まだその時には3Dになってなくて
subtitles.english: We weren't 3D back then.

subtitles.original: そうだっけ？
subtitles.english: Was it like that?

subtitles.original: そうだよ
subtitles.english: Yeah, it was.

subtitles.original: そうだわ
subtitles.english: Oh, that's right.

subtitles.original: ゲームしてる時にさ、してたそんな話
subtitles.english: We talked about that while playing games.

subtitles.original: そうそうそう
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: だから、3Dになった時コラボしようねって話をしてて、
subtitles.english: So we were saying let's collab when we get 3D,

subtitles.original: ウン年後、ついに呼んでいただけました
subtitles.english: and years later, you finally invited me.

subtitles.original: 緊張してない？
subtitles.english: Are you nervous?

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。ちょっと緊張してます。
subtitles.english: Thank you. I'm a little nervous.

subtitles.original: しかも疲れすぎだろ！
subtitles.english: And you're way too tired!

subtitles.original: 疲れすぎだろ！
subtitles.english: Too tired, right?

subtitles.original: そりゃあ、トワさんはアイドルですけど、
subtitles.english: Well, Towa-san, you're an idol, but

subtitles.original: 私は一般ゲーマーなんで、ちょっと体力のほうがね
subtitles.english: I'm just a regular gamer, so my stamina is just...

subtitles.original: 自分の記念日とかに踊ったりしてたじゃん
subtitles.english: But you've danced for your own anniversaries and such.

subtitles.original: まあ、でもそんな…
subtitles.english: Well, yeah, but still...

subtitles.original: おばやめてよ
subtitles.english: Stop acting like an old lady.

subtitles.original: おばなんだから、しょうがない
subtitles.english: I am an old lady, so it's only natural.

subtitles.original: 今日、トワは誕生日なんだけど
subtitles.english: Today is Towa's birthday,

subtitles.original: トワちゃん！
subtitles.english: Towa-chan!

subtitles.original: 誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 欲しがり！欲しがりなのよ
subtitles.english: Greedy! You're so greedy.

subtitles.original: いつものやつね
subtitles.english: Always the same old thing.

subtitles.original: ちなみにこれ、ダンス練習一緒にやってて面白かったことがあったんだよね
subtitles.english: By the way, something funny happened while we were practicing the dance.

subtitles.original: 言ってくださいよ
subtitles.english: Please tell them.

subtitles.original: サビに入る前に、私たちこうやって重なってたじゃないですか
subtitles.english: Before the chorus, we were overlapping like this, right?

subtitles.original: 私、あの時前だったっけ？
subtitles.english: Was I in front then?

subtitles.original: 1サビ前がトワが前で、こういう感じだよね
subtitles.english: Before the first chorus, Towa was in front, like this.

subtitles.original: で、2サビが反対なんだよね
subtitles.english: And in the second chorus, it's the opposite.

subtitles.original: 私が後ろで、本当はこうなんだけど、
subtitles.english: I was supposed to be in the back, like this,

subtitles.original: なんか勢い余って、同じ角度で
subtitles.english: but with too much momentum, I ended up at the same angle.

subtitles.original: 鏡を見て練習するんだけど、トワがこうやって顔が見えるんですよ
subtitles.english: We're practicing looking in the mirror, and Towa can see her face.

subtitles.original: でも目の前にひなのが同じポーズでこうなってるから、
subtitles.english: But Hinano is right in front of me in the same pose,

subtitles.original: 「え、見えない！」ってなって、全く見えなくて
subtitles.english: so I was like, "Wait, I can't see!" I couldn't see anything.

subtitles.original: それでしばらくツボってたよね
subtitles.english: We were laughing about that for a while.

subtitles.original: だいぶツボって、そのあと普通に合ってるのに、
subtitles.english: We were laughing so hard. Then, even though it was right,

subtitles.original: 「あれ、あれ？」みたいになってたんだけど
subtitles.english: it was like, "Wait, is this right?"

subtitles.original: ずっと引っ張ってたんですけど、今日はできてよかったです
subtitles.english: We kept that joke going, but I'm glad we could do it today.

subtitles.original: よかったです、できて
subtitles.english: I'm glad we could.

subtitles.original: ということで、今日は8月8日なんですけれども
subtitles.english: So, today is August 8th,

subtitles.original: なんと今月末にはぶいさいっていうのがありまして
subtitles.english: and at the end of this month, there's V-Saikyo.

subtitles.original: 今日は仲良く踊って歌ったんですけど、ライバルになります
subtitles.english: We sang and danced together today, but we'll be rivals there.

subtitles.original: お互いリーダー枠ですもんね
subtitles.english: We're both leaders, after all.

subtitles.original: 去年、去年もね、私もあなたもちょっと、やめようやめよう
subtitles.english: Last year... both of us had... let's not talk about it.

subtitles.original: やめよう！
subtitles.english: Let's not!

subtitles.original: お互いライバルだけど、払拭しよう、去年のを
subtitles.english: Even though we're rivals, let's clear away last year's feelings.

subtitles.original: ライバルだけど頑張りましょうね
subtitles.english: Let's do our best as rivals.

subtitles.original: ぶいさもよろしくお願いします
subtitles.english: Good luck with V-Saikyo too.

subtitles.original: お願いします
subtitles.english: Good luck.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、次の曲へどうぞって一緒に言ってもらえますか？
subtitles.english: Then, could you say "Please enjoy the next song" with me?

subtitles.original: もちろん
subtitles.english: Of course.

subtitles.original: お互いに好きなポーズしよう
subtitles.english: Let's do our favorite poses.

subtitles.original: これ、仲良し度大事だから、これ
subtitles.english: This is important for showing our friendship.

subtitles.original: せーの、次の曲へどうぞ！
subtitles.english: One, two, please enjoy the next song!
